name: T.A.G.W.Y.H.O.P.P.D.a.a.D.o.S.S.
description:
This is my entry for Ludum Dare 33, theme "You are the monster", and I'm pretty happy with it :D

The Game

The big city with streets full of people. You hate it. Your job sucks. You hate it, too. Every day you face the same internal fight: Earn money... or punch those who pass by making fun of your uniform?

Try to make a living handing out pamphlets or hit people "by mistake"!

How to Play

You have 1 minute to hand out the pamphlets and earn money. Be careful because if you run out of papers, you'll start hitting people and losing money! Recharge them on the "recharging station".

Hold long enough and you'll receive the greatest help!

Controls
  • Cursors / ASDW - Move
  • X / Left Mouse Button - "Give"
  • M - Mute music
  • Escape - Exit / end game.
Tags

#LDJAM #LD33
